title: Dancing Strings
description:
# Dancing Strings

Given a string of lowercase letters, your task is to transform it by placing a dash ('-') between each character of the string. Do not add a dash at the end of the string. The input will be a single line representing the string, and the output should be the transformed string as described. The input string will contain only lowercase letters and will have a length between 1 and 1000.

## Example 1

Input:

~~~txt
hello
~~~

Output:

~~~txt
h-e-l-l-o
~~~

## Example 2

Input:

~~~txt
world
~~~

Output:

~~~txt
w-o-r-l-d
~~~
